price: Yeroo Nuti nama irratti tola oolle, (galatoomfachurraa) gara gala cinaacha isaatiin fagaata. Yeroo hamtuun isa tuqe yeruma san abbaa kadhaa hedduu ta’a.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ أَعۡرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَذُو دُعَآءٍ عَرِيضٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā anʿamnā ʿalā al-insāni aʿraḍa wanaā bijānibihi wa-idhā massahu al-sharu fadhū duʿāin ʿarīḍin
